events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System detected keywords related to refund and categorized the issue accordingly for appropriate handling.
Customer support agent John D. has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 456789 and I have attached the photo of the item I received, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
I appreciate your quick response and the prompt refund offer. That works perfectly for me, thank you!
The refund has been processed on our end. Please contact us if you do not receive it within the specified timeframe.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since the refund was completed and the customer confirmed receipt, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
